posts.title: Stainless Steel Melon Slicer
posts.content: The stainless steel melon slicer makes cutting and sharing large fruits like watermelons and cantaloupes easier than ever. It features an ergonomic design with soft grip handles for easy cutting, and slices your fruit into 12 equal pieces so you can share with everyone.

posts.title: World Landmark Sand Molds
posts.content: Why settle for poorly built sand castles when you can construct monuments with the world landmark sand molds. No other kid on the beach will be able to compete against the magnificent creations your offspring erects with remarkable ease.

posts.title: Finger Pointing Bookmark
posts.content: Pick up right where you left off with the finger pointing bookmark. This clever bookmark makes it easy to keep track – down the exact sentence where you last stopped reading – so you can jump right back into the story without skimming through any extra paragraphs.

posts.title: No Mess Ice Cream Holder
posts.content: Help keep your little one’s clothes clean while they enjoy their frozen treat by placing it inside this no mess ice cream holder. Designed for both cones and popsicles, the oversized border catches all the sticky ice cream that drips off the cone.

posts.title: Bear Shaped Hamster House
posts.content: Make your little rodent happier than ever by moving her into this adorable bear shaped hamster house. Designed in the shape of a cuddly bear, this cozy home comes with a replaceable pad for easy clean-up and is ideal for any small rodent – not just hamsters.

posts.title: Map Marker Push Pins
posts.content: Make priority tasks stand out on your bulletin board with these map marker push pins. The set comes with eight small push pins designed to look exactly like the location icons you find on maps – making them ideal for marking off your adventures on a world map.

posts.title: Titanic Tea Bag Holder
posts.content: Make light of one of the greatest tragedies of the early twentieth century every time you sit down for a nice cup of tea by preparing it using this Titanic tea bag holder. This novelty infuser is crafted from silicone and sticks up over the mug as it infuses the hot water.

posts.title: Solar Powered Light Up Mason Jar
posts.content: Keep your yard lit up without adding to your electric bill by using this solar powered light up mason jar lid. The metallic lid fits any standard mason jar and comes with an embedded solar panel that provides up to 12 hours of light on a single charge.

posts.title: MaKey MaKey Invention Kit
posts.content: Make your world come alive with the MaKey MaKey invention kit. It transforms everyday objects into touch pads you can combine with the internet. It’s the 21st century invention kit that is perfect for people of any skill set – from beginners to expert engineers.

posts.title: Friday The 13th Guitar Pick
posts.content: Have a killer performance with this Friday The 13th guitar pick that will have your audience dying for more. Inspired by the iconic horror flick’s ominous hockey mask, these Friday The 13th Guitar picks come in a pack of six, and are perfect for musically talented serial killers.

posts.title: French Toast Stamp
posts.content: Make breakfast a memorable meal when you add a personal touch using the French toast stamp on your morning meal. With each stamp, the delicious toast gets its own unofficial seal of authenticity that display the Eiffel Towel along with a cheerful “Bonjour!” message.

posts.title: Double Chamber Drink Cooler
posts.content: Keep your refreshments icy cold all day long without them ever becoming diluted by pouring them inside this double chamber drink cooler. The ingenious design comes with a built in two gallon ice container at the center.
